**As a** SOMEONE,
<!-- Who is the storyteller? -->

**I want** ALLTHETHINGS,
<!-- Describe the want/need in as few words as possible. Avoid the "how". -->

**so that** VALUE.
<!-- What is the value to the storyteller? -->
